data.name: FunFitLand
data.description:
**üåü FunFitLand Christmas Update! üéÑ**
Celebrate with us:
1. Holiday Refresh: We are adding a sprinkle of holiday charm to the main screen. Let's get in the festive mood!
2. Earn Fireworks with Calories: Burn 50 calories to light up the sky with dazzling fireworks.
3. Unwrap Your Mystery Gift: Launch at least one firework to reveal your special holiday surprise.
4. Introducing 'FunFitShares': Connect and share workout replays in our 'Community' tab. Follow our Facebook and Discord to hop on.
5. Improved Performance: Enjoy faster loading. Also, the dance glove trails are now more magical and fun.

Discover FunFitLand: Dive into a world of truly innovative fitness adventures. Encounter workouts that feel instinctive, utterly delightful, and unmistakably new. JOIN ALPHA TODAY and co-create a fitness journey that resonates with your vibe.

ü§ù Become One of the First
Join a community where your feedback and success are celebrated. Follow us to get EARLY ACCESS to new contents!
Twitter: @joinfunfitland
Discord: discord.gg/KRcCrRAdvV
Facebook: www.facebook.com/groups/funfitlanderrealm/
